title: Marykeller
author: Marykeller
content: Only few weeks wey our newly elected president Tinubu don take over the mantle of leadership so many new bills and changes have been put in place in a short interval. Em go be like sae the FG are in a hurry to change and implement new new bills like sae them no get up to 4 years to rule the country again. Source link: https://politicsnigeria.com/breaking-government-cant-fund-universities-anymore-fg-declares/At this time wey the country's economy and her citizen are not stabilize financially with the new development that has been put into law, the FG come throw and another bombshell that they can't fund our university anymore.  This means that universities are going to be sourcing their funds by themselves to keep it running. This will entirely make tuition fees of all Nigeria university to become expensive.Wetin be una yarn for this matter because the way I d see am the implication no here. Peso no go spend big money for university come later the find work join. The student loan bill na em be the solution to all this or not? Make una suggest the way forward for our educational sector this time around

comments.author: Framelover
comments.body: It’s really concerning that BAT is introducing new bills and changes so fast. It makes me wonder if he really thinks about these decisions before introducing and concluding on them. I hope there’s a long term plan towards all of these that will in turn have a positive impact on the our country at large. I really hope that our sufferings will be worth it in the end.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: The student loan was a good appraisal the government used to shield themselves if there be any retaliation from the students and asuu.At first the federal government approved of the student loan because of this plans ahead. If the student union resist they will tell them to go get a loan as it is easy to access. They have succeeded in forcing the students to have alternative choice of paying their fees if they complain of that.The second is an indirect attack on asuu. Since the federal government universities are majorly the assuu member, they are indirectly telling them go make your way for yourself we can not afford to put up with your bill anymore.ASUU is gradually losing the battle against federal government with this new policy if we are to go by it.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: All of them including the past leaders have all benefited from the opportunity of free education and that's part of what has given them the opportunity to be among those elite who are exposed today and to have the opportunity to study and pursue after their ambitions in life through the western free education scheme then, I want to believe that this was not done because of the newly implemented scheme for students loans

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.created_time: June 16, 2023, 07:08:15 PMLast edit: June 16, 2023, 07:18:41 PM by Mate2237
comments.body: If government no go fit fund varsities then the government indirectly against education. How can a president of a country come out and tell the well educated citizens say im no go fund varsities, im time dem no fund am. If no fund am then na who go fund am. The students? Nai make im dey give the students loan? Dis president is missing something here in the country. He should calm down and plan well to carry out action. Education control all the other parts of the country so anything that happen to education affect other institutions. Me di way I dey see am Tinubu is trying to make things harder than the previous president. Free education has been on ground since the creation of the country even before the independent. The Eastern Region, Western Region And Northern Region all were having Free education. It was only the Northern Region that against free education but later they also support the motion. So I don't know why a Western Region man who love education to the core is against free education at this point which Nigerian youth need free education at top. Awolowo was the initiator of the free education from the Western  world as a comparative education at that time. Then Azic also loved the idea and used it. Tinubu is planning to suffer the poor parents in Nigeria. Toruorua University and Medical University are all in Bayelsa were issuing scholarships to students and the scholarship end only two years. After the two years most of the students could not pay the school fees again do they have to dropped out. And this is going to happen in the whole country. He should think well and reverse that policy because it will affect 95% of the students in Nation Wide.

comments.author: Zaguru12
comments.body: Quote from: Mate2237 on June 16, 2023, 07:21:56 PMWell let it be that it is a fake news because that news is not a favourable news to many Nigerian homes. Some people plant cassava to train their children and some of them na fishing, whole some nai gin so all those category of people will be affected because the VCs will definitely increase the school fees to meet up the expenses of the school. This is a very bad news ever and for decays and centuries as a country. Not every policy we hear of is actually bad it depends on other policies around it. The first question one need to ask is what has all the fees by student been used for and how much are we currently paying for an education that is isn’t top quality again. See I will tell you this even the west or Middle East Nigerians rush to get quality education or to evade strikers are under autonomy and students pay tuition fees there. So once this government decides not to be fully responsible for every tertiary institution again then there will be addition of tuition fees. The only thing the government will do is to find other alternatives of helping students. The first is to make the after school life easier that can be achieved with employment opportunities for graduates. Also the government can as well set aside scholarships for extraordinary students for full payment and this will actually create an healthy competition and give students with poor backgrounds a stepping block to be par with others. If each university is granted their autonomy then it will mean that some staffs will be relieved off their jobs most of these people are either visiting lecturers or those with queries. And if you look at the issue of visiting lecturers it sometimes manipulated by some of them even though it is legal they only come to classes just once. The only problem now is what will the government made use of the money meant for universities for. One they could increase the amount of funds giving to tetfunds and this will only increase the number of infrastructures and equipments provided to schools. Also this money could be use for employment creation, and also to be added to the budget on the plan increase of minimum wage.

comments.author: Stable090
comments.body: I don't believe that this is a good idea because if the government stops funding universities, the universities will be forced to raise tuition fees, which will make education more expensive. I believe that the student loan bill would be beneficial, but despite the benefits, it also has drawbacks. My main worry is the increase in price that will occur if the government stops funding the universities. but let us hope it is still under deliberation we hope they don't implement it.

comments.body: As PDAT don bring out student loan wey many people don applaud am, now na no funding of universities from the government. School wey you go you no want make common man pikin go because big man pikin no dey go public universities na private university or dem travel go abroad go school. Already school fees dey on de high side so if government no go assist in funding universities anymore I wonder how the school fees go look like.For instance, 4 years program wey person suppose spend like 1M for school fees, with dis development person fit spend like 5 - 6M because naso e go be school fees go skyrocket. Wetin be the essence of the student loan? Na to borrow this big money to complete school come use 10 years of your life after school dey pay am small small? Na who dem dey deceive? Make PDAT no loosegaurd ooo, make him no go down this path ooo because e no good at all. If him wan do something wey go win the hearts of nigerians make him cut down the salaries and remove all those stupid allowances wey our lawmakers dey receive.

comments.body: As we take the hammer on this matter whether na fake or not, for it not happen because it is not a good move give our educational system. On top of that, the the Federal Ministry of Education don already hit Nigerians with their own kasala since May 25th before Tinubu enter office sef. This move by the Federal Ministry of Education via the new update of fees for all the federal unit colleges nationwide from JS1-SS3. Come the make me ask question of which FG come accept this fees increment of all the federal unit colleges nationwide cos I no understand. Picture of fees increment attach below     Nigeria parents raise alarm over alleged hike in school feesAll this increment for school fees no happen during my secondary school days. Wetin I been pay na 850naira although na state school but my friend's wey go federal schools wey be borders no pay pass 7k. Soon enough education go be for the rich people.
